$WmMPID_ヒノカ,ch05_26_Hinoka_F_Normal,Face|Takumi, Sakura—let's go! If this could
help us get stronger, we must see it
through to the end! For Ryoma!$k$p$WmMPID_サクラ,ch05_18_Sakura_F_Normal,Face|I-I've never drilled with an army this
large before... But I'll try my hardest
not to disappoint anyone!$k$p$WmMPID_タクミ,ch05_09_Takumi_M_Normal,Face|It's rather unlike you to be so ready
for battle, Sakura... How is it that you
can always muster such enthusiasm?$k$p
